name: BlendMaster Smart Blender
description: A smart blender with multiple speed settings and pre-programmed recipes.

name: BlendMaster Coffee Maker 2.0
description: A programmable coffee maker with a built-in grinder and auto-brew feature.

name: BlendMaster Air Fryer Pro
description: An air fryer with adjustable temperature settings and a large capacity basket.

name: BlendMaster Electric Kettle
description: A fast-boiling electric kettle with an automatic shut-off feature.

name: BlendMaster Toaster Oven
description: A versatile toaster oven with convection cooking and multiple toast settings.

name: BlendMaster Stand Mixer
description: A powerful stand mixer with multiple speed settings and a range of attachments.

name: BlendMaster Food Processor
description: A multi-functional food processor with slicing, dicing, and chopping capabilities.

name: BlendMaster Slow Cooker
description: A programmable slow cooker with a removable ceramic pot for easy cleaning.

name: BlendMaster Vacuum Cleaner
description: A lightweight vacuum cleaner with strong suction and HEPA filtration.

name: BlendMaster Ice Cream Maker
description: An ice cream maker with a built-in compressor and multiple flavor settings.
